channel.title: Late night snack?
channel.description:
Lately I have been eating a lot of hot pockets and well frankly, I am getting sick of them. So any idea's for a simple late night snack that does not include the following:
grilled cheese sandwiches leftovers hot pockets cold cereal gruel vagina peanut butter and jelly sandwiches eggs penis or any slang related terms of penis my own shoe microwave burritos ice cream cup ramen instant noodles
all suggestions not previously mentioned are welcomed!

item.title: Late night snack?

zebra cakes

horrible for u but so good

item.title: Late night snack?

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:5, topic:457656”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=560581.msg4092210#msg4092210 date=1346493585]

Have you tried popcorn?

I suck at making popcorn, its either i burn it all or like half of it isn’t cooked.
[/quote]Do it on the stove with a tiny bit of oil, can’t go wrong.

what type of pot or pan should i use?[/quote]
